document.discussion_title: U.K. ‘Would Be Safer From Terrorism and Crime if It Stays in the European Union’
document.topic_text: WSJ - 2016-04-25T18:50:43.587000 Britain’s Home Secretary Theresa May said the U.K. would be safer from terrorism and other crime by remaining in the European Union, in her first major speech of the campaign ahead of a referendum on Britain’s continued membership of the bloc.
document.post: WSJ - 2016-04-25T18:50:43.587000 Britain’s Home Secretary Theresa May said the U.K. would be safer from terrorism and other crime by remaining in the European Union, in her first major speech of the campaign ahead of a referendum on Britain’s continued membership of the bloc.
